title: Implement Tool Management E2E Tests
description:
Create end-to-end tests for the tool management functionality.

Files to modify:
- backend/test/e2e/tools.e2e-spec.ts (new)

Changes needed:
1. Create e2e test suite covering:
   - Tool creation with automatic image
   - Tool listing
   - Tool editing
   - Tool deletion
   - Authorization checks
   - Image fallback behavior
2. Test error cases and validation

Testing:
- Run full e2e test suite
- Verify all acceptance criteria are covered

Acceptance Criteria:
- Verifies all acceptance criteria (AC01-AC07)
- Tests both happy path and error cases
- Tests image fallback functionality
